protocol_name: RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
description:
Daniel Richter, Nov 29, 2011

based on RNAqueous May 29, 2008 protocol revision C, TURBO DNA-free June 9, 2009 protocol 1907M revision F
affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)
manuscript_citation: Richter, Daniel J and Fozouni, Parinaz and Eisen, Michael and King, Nicole. Gene family innovation, conservation and loss on the animal stem lineage. 2018;7:e34226 https://doi.org/10.7554/eLife.34226

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

collections.protocol_name: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates
collections.protocol_name_html: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates

guidelines: To avoid possible RNA degradation, try to work quickly in all steps.

components.data: Place elution solution in a dry bath at 70-80ºC
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place elution solution in a dry bath at 70-80ºC

components.data: Elution Solution Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Place pellet in a 50 mL conical tube on ice
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place pellet in a 50 mL conical tube on ice

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Add lysis buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add lysis buffer

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Pipette up and down 5 times to resuspend pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipette up and down 5 times to resuspend pellet

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: While still on ice, add additional lysis buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: While still on ice, add additional lysis buffer

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Pipette up and down 20 times to fully resuspend/lyse pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipette up and down 20 times to fully resuspend/lyse pellet

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Transfer into two 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes on ice
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer into two 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes on ice

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Aliquot onto glass slide to check lysis from one Eppendorf tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aliquot onto glass slide to check lysis from one Eppendorf tube

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
source_data.annotation: Keep the slide inside a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained
source_data.thread_text: Keep the slide inside a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained
source_data.body: Keep the slide inside a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained

components.data: Immediately centrifuge both tubes at max speed in a microcentrifuge at 1ºC, 5 min to pellet unlysed bacteria
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immediately centrifuge both tubes at max speed in a microcentrifuge at 1ºC, 5 min to pellet unlysed bacteria

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: During centrifugation, add cover slip to glass slide and quickly confirm lysis using a microscope
components.name: Description

source_data.description: During centrifugation, add cover slip to glass slide and quickly confirm lysis using a microscope

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 10 of RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with TURBO DNA-free and SUPERase-In
source_data.annotation: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes; otherwise, continue with the same tubes
source_data.thread_text: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes; otherwise, continue with the same tubes
source_data.body: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes; otherwise, continue with the same tubes

components.data: On ice, pass the lysate in each tube 5 times through a 25 gauge needle fitted to an RNAse-free 1 mL syringe
components.name: Description

source_data.description: On ice, pass the lysate in each tube 5 times through a 25 gauge needle fitted to an RNAse-free 1 mL syringe

source_data.annotation: If the cells were not lysed in step 2, pass through the needle an additional time, and re-check lysis before continuing.
source_data.thread_text: If the cells were not lysed in step 2, pass through the needle an additional time, and re-check lysis before continuing.
source_data.body: If the cells were not lysed in step 2, pass through the needle an additional time, and re-check lysis before continuing.

components.data: Spec on NanoDrop and make a dilution at 1:5 (2 µl :8 µl) in a separate tube for PCR/Bioanalyzer
components.name: Description

components.data: TURBO DNAse Treatment
components.name: Section

components.data: Take an aliquot of 1:5 dilution from previous step and dilute to 1 ng/µL in a seperate tube (for Bioanalyzer)
components.name: Description

source_data.annotation: If concentration is >240 ng/uL (10 ug / 41.5 uL), dilute an aliquot to 240 ng/uL in 41.5 uL and save remainder at -80 C
source_data.thread_text: If concentration is >240 ng/uL (10 ug / 41.5 uL), dilute an aliquot to 240 ng/uL in 41.5 uL and save remainder at -80 C
source_data.body: If concentration is >240 ng/uL (10 ug / 41.5 uL), dilute an aliquot to 240 ng/uL in 41.5 uL and save remainder at -80 C

components.data: Add SUPERase-In (at 20 U/µL, final concentration at 1 U/µL)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add SUPERase-In (at 20 U/µL, final concentration at 1 U/µL)

components.name: Section

components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate at 37ºC for 30 min

components.name: Section

components.name: Section

components.data: TURBO DNAse Treatment
components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate 5 min at 22-26ºC, flicking to mix 2-3 times during incubation.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate 5 min at 22-26ºC, flicking to mix 2-3 times during incubation.

source_data.annotation: To avoid transferring beads, pipette out at an angle and rotate tube such that beads are on the bottom.

source_data.body: To avoid transferring beads, pipette out at an angle and rotate tube such that beads are on the bottom.

components.data: Repeat centrifugation/transfer (steps 39-40) 2-3 times until no beads are transferred
